name: Japanese Drag Racing (JDM) - ジェイディーエム
name_original: Japanese Drag Racing (JDM) - ジェイディーエム
description:
In Japanese Drag Racing you can get the most out of each car in the iconic style of the '80s to the new ones. Test their original performance in classic head-to-head drag races!
Race, Tune, Upgrade and Customize over 15 different car styles from JDM(japanese cars).

Your imagination knows no boundaries - combine all customization options to make your own state of the art car livery design which will make your garage unique and standing out.

Game features:
- 120 drag racing levels
- 15 different cities like Miami, Tokyo
- 15 japanese cars
- Dozens of car parts for your japanese beauties
– A very large range of customization and colour options

What are you waiting for? Enter now in the craziest Japanese Drag Racing game on the market and be the KING OF THE ROADS!
